text.value: Date widget (this one loads a default value set in the form)
This shows the outcome of a hidden calculation:

Note widget. In notes you can emphasize _words_ or _multiple words_ or __strongly emphasize something__. You can also use a line break to start a new sentence.
The decimal number you entered was .
You can also add media to choices. Choose your favorite bird.
Geopoint widget that hides input fields by default

This form showcases the different available _widgets_.
The hints explain how these widgets were created. The form logo was added by simply uploading a file called *form_logo.png* as part of the form media.
The XLS Form source is [here](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheet/ccc?key=0Al3Mw5sknZoPdEpPa29tamFCc1o2bmFVR3RaemlSRXc&usp=sharing).
Fixed number of columns (2), and no buttons
Select one widget displaying horizontally in columns
Select one displaying as a Likert item
Select multiple widget displaying horizontally in columns
Multiline Text widget in enketo (in ODK collect this a normal text field)

input.hint: Can be short or long but always one line (type = text)
This is a text input that will show the numbers keyboard on mobile devices (type=text, appearance=numbers)
Scans multi-format 1d/2d barcodes. In enketo it allows manual entry (type=barcode)
This field has a constraint (type=integer, constraint=.<10)
This field has a constraint (type=decimal, constraint=. > 10.51 and . < 18.39)

range.hint: A horizontal range widget without ticks (type=range, appearance=no-ticks)
A horizontal range widget without ticks (type=range, appearance=picker)
A horizontal range widget without ticks (type=range, appearance=rating)
A highly specific widget to measure distress(type=range, appearance=distress)

input.hint: Simply specify an appearance style (type=date, appearance=month-year)
Simply specify and appearance style (type=date, appearance=year)
For exact times, will be converted to UTC/GMT (type=dateTime)

select.hint: Using a list specified in the choices worksheet (type=select_multiple)
Showing a pull-down list of options (type=select_multiple list, appearance=minimal)

select1.hint: Showing a pull-down list of options (type=select_one list, appearance=minimal)
Type e.g. 'g' to filter options. (type=select_one, appearance=autocomplete)
Make sure to put a.jpg and b.jpg in the form-media folder to see images here. (type=select_one, appearance=no-buttons)
Grid with a maximum of 2 columns. (type=select_one a_b, appearance=columns-2 no-buttons)
Show only the labels of these options and not the inputs (type=select_one yes_no, appearance=label)
Show only the inputs of these options and not the labels (type=select_one yes_no, appearance=list-nolabel)
Show only the inputs of these options and not the labels (type=select_one yes_no, appearance=list-nolabel)
No need to do anything special here
No need to do anything special here
Using a choice filter to update options based on a previous answer (choice_filter: country = )
Using a choice filter to update options based on previous answers (choice_filter: country = and city = )
Using a choice filter to update options based on a previous answer (choice_filter: country = , appearance: minimal)
Using a choice filter to update options based on previous answers (choice_filter: country = and city = , appearance = minimal)

input.hint: Show a larger map (on desktop screens), you can hide the input fields. (appearance=hide-input)
Record a sequence of geopoints (type=geotrace, appearance=maps hide-input)
Record a closed sequence/polygon of geopoints (type=geoshape, appearance=maps hide-input)

upload.hint: Select an image or take a photo (type=image)
Upload and annotate an image (type=image, appearance=annotate)
Select an audio file or record audio (type=audio)
Select a video file or record a video (type=video)

input.hint: This is a note and it uses a value of another field in its label (type=note)

select1.hint: Add the file name in the image column on your choices sheet. Make sure you upload this file when you publish your form.

trigger.hint: Prompts for confirmation. Useful to combine with required or relevant. (type=trigger)

input.hint: Calculations are very powerful feature. They are not only used for displaying results but can also be used in skip logic and validation.
